descriptionHtml:
I was asked to make this by a Twitch Streamer named Bananadongle, he is a darkelf hulkster, use 2handed weapons, built for it, he is always angry.

You dont need anything special for this one just racemenu and skse.

To instal her just use MO or NMM as i have already done the file path needed for an easy install, saves you time.

For my other creations i will put a link

Rain        [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62624/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62624/?[/url]
Drangle   [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62515/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62515/?[/url]
Erolin      [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62255/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62255/?[/url]

Lyandria  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61618/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61618/?
[/url]Takata    [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61372/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61372/?
[/url]Lin Sui Lie [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61949/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61949/?[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61372/?]
[/url]New Whiterunv1  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61857/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61857/?
[/url]New Solitudev2    [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60972/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60972/?
[/url]New Windhelmv1 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60944/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60944/?
[/url]
I will be doing more texture and preset mods in the future, i do get better with each one, i just hope that some people like them if not then there is no harm done as not everyone likes the same stuff, i do makes these for my game and i choose to share them so the few that use them can have a choice in what they want their skyrim to look like, after all skyrim is a fantasy game and anything is possible with fantasy.

If you want to make him a follower go ahead, if you want to upload funny screenshots of him on this page go ahead
author: Tamikonelf
